summary: The lives of two best friends who work together in a mortuary changes upside down when they answer a call over a cell phone found in the pocket of a fresh body.
cast: Gordan Kicic|Vuk Kostic|Zorana Becic|Fedja Stojanovic|Vlasta Velisavljevic|Petar Bozovic|Marija Jaksic|Slobodan 'Boda' Ninkovic|Goran Danicic|Dragan Petrovic-Pele|Erol Kadic|Milos Stojanovic|Vesna Pocuca-Sana|Jovan Ristovski|Branislav Tomasevic|Milos Samolov|Vladimir Kerkez|Gordana Les|Miodrag Fisekovic|Snezana Jeremic|Danilo Dudic|Mirko Mijuskovic
title: Mala nocna muzika
